mapper.sql: id, 卫星编号, NASA编号, 卫星名称, 所属星座, 卫星类型, 遥测频率, 遥测ERP值, 遥控频率, 遥控接收增益, 数据下行频率, 数据下行ERP值, 数据上行频率, 数据上行接收增益, 业务下行接收增益, 业务下行ERP值, 业务上行频率, 业务上行接收增益, 倾角, 升交点赤径, 偏心率, 半长轴, 近地点角距, 近地点时刻
mapper.insert: insert into 卫星信息表 (id, 卫星编号, NASA编号, 卫星名称, 所属星座, 卫星类型, 遥测频率, 遥测ERP值, 遥控频率, 遥控接收增益, 数据下行频率, 数据下行ERP值, 数据上行频率, 数据上行接收增益, 业务下行接收增益, 业务下行ERP值, 业务上行频率, 业务上行接收增益, 倾角, 升交点赤径, 偏心率, 半长轴, 近地点角距, 近地点时刻 ) values (#{id}, #{satelliteUuid}, #{nasaUuid}, #{satelliteName}, #{constellationType}, #{satelliteType}, #{telemetryFrequency}, #{telemetryErp}, #{telecontrolFrequency}, #{telecontrolReceivingGain}, #{dataDownlinkFrequency}, #{dataDownlinkErp}, #{dataUplinkFrequency}, #{dataUplinkReceivingGain}, #{businessDownlinkReceivingGain}, #{businessDownlinkErp}, #{businessUplinkFrequency}, #{businessUplinkReceivingGain}, #{dipAngle}, #{equatorialRadius}, #{eccentricity}, #{majorSemiaxis}, #{perigeeAngularDistance}, #{perigeeMoment} )
mapper.update:
update 卫星信息表
卫星编号 = #{satelliteUuid},
NASA编号 = #{nasaUuid},
卫星名称 = #{satelliteName},
所属星座 = #{constellationType},
卫星类型 = #{satelliteType},
遥测频率 = #{telemetryFrequency},
遥测ERP值 = #{telemetryErp},
遥控频率 = #{telecontrolFrequency},
遥控接收增益 = #{telecontrolReceivingGain},
数据下行频率 = #{dataDownlinkFrequency},
数据下行ERP值 = #{dataDownlinkErp},
数据上行频率 = #{dataUplinkFrequency},
数据上行接收增益 = #{dataUplinkReceivingGain},
业务下行接收增益 = #{businessDownlinkReceivingGain},
业务下行ERP值 = #{businessDownlinkErp},
业务上行频率 = #{businessUplinkFrequency},
业务上行接收增益 = #{businessUplinkReceivingGain},
倾角 = #{dipAngle},
升交点赤径 = #{equatorialRadius},
偏心率 = #{eccentricity},
半长轴 = #{majorSemiaxis},
近地点角距 = #{perigeeAngularDistance},
近地点时刻 = #{perigeeMoment},
where 卫星编号 = #{satelliteUuid}

update 卫星信息表 set 卫星编号 = #{satelliteUuid}, NASA编号 = #{nasaUuid}, 卫星名称 = #{satelliteName}, 所属星座 = #{constellationType}, 卫星类型 = #{satelliteType}, 遥测频率 = #{telemetryFrequency}, 遥测ERP值 = #{telemetryErp}, 遥控频率 = #{telecontrolFrequency}, 遥控接收增益 = #{telecontrolReceivingGain}, 数据下行频率 = #{dataDownlinkFrequency}, 数据下行ERP值 = #{dataDownlinkErp}, 数据上行频率 = #{dataUplinkFrequency}, 数据上行接收增益 = #{dataUplinkReceivingGain}, 业务下行接收增益 = #{businessDownlinkReceivingGain}, 业务下行ERP值 = #{businessDownlinkErp}, 业务上行频率 = #{businessUplinkFrequency}, 业务上行接收增益 = #{businessUplinkReceivingGain}, 倾角 = #{dipAngle}, 升交点赤径 = #{equatorialRadius}, 偏心率 = #{eccentricity}, 半长轴 = #{majorSemiaxis}, 近地点角距 = #{perigeeAngularDistance}, 近地点时刻 = #{perigeeMoment} where id = #{id}
